citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a written contingency plan document. This contingency plan must be developed, documented
and followed in order to ensure animals are handled in a humane manner in the event of an emergency or disaster.
Document the facilities contingency plan and ensure that all employees are trained in their roles within the plan.
Correct by: September 21, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility does not have a written contingency plan document. This contingency plan must be developed, documented 
and followed in order to ensure animals are handled in a humane manner in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
Document the facilities contingency plan and ensure that all employees are trained in their roles within the plan. 
Correct by: September 21, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
